resources.string: This activity has categories such as Albums, Artist, Playlists and Online store to buy music. It is a preview of Music Library Activity in MusicX App

1. This app uses Android Pay API for the transaction\n\n 2. The initial step of adding api is to add dependencies in project\'s build.gradle file and modifying the manifest file to enable Android Pay app in the app
3. When user clicks Buy Button, it calls isReadyToPay() method to check whether the user has the Android Pay app installed and is ready to pay.
4. If this method returns true, show the Android Pay button.
5. If it returns false, display other checkout options along with text notifying the user to set up the Android Pay app.
6. Now, request for payment and network token is made by google
7. Wallet Fragment is used to ease the process of purchasing and in meantime, request to Masked Wallet is created so as to get the Wallet Information
8. And finally when user goes with option Pay with Android Pay, it retrieves Masked Wallet and returns it to onActivityResult()
